20110109140112.000|20110109140113.000|CC1|MORNING, JENNA.                 
20110109140113.000|20110109140116.000|CC1|IT ALL HAPPENED AT THIS SHOPPING
20110109140116.000|20110109140120.000|CC1|CENTER,Y CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE
20110109140120.000|20110109140123.000|CC1|GIFFORDS WAS HOSTING A SIDEWALK 
20110109140123.000|20110109140124.000|CC1|GATHERING.                      
20110109140124.000|20110109140126.000|CC1|A GUNMAN OPENED UP.             
20110109140126.000|20110109140129.000|CC1|SIX PEOPLE WERE KILLED, AMONG   
20110109140129.000|20110109140132.000|CC1|THEM A 9-YEAR-OLD GIRL AND A    
20110109140132.000|20110109140135.000|CC1|FEDERAL DISTRICT JUDGE.         
20110109140135.000|20110109140137.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS WAS SHOT 
20110109140137.000|20110109140138.000|CC1|IN THE HEAD.                    
20110109140138.000|20110109140140.000|CC1|SHE REMAINS IN CRITICAL         
20110109140140.000|20110109140141.000|CC1|CONDITION THIS MORNING, BUT     
20110109140141.000|20110109140143.000|CC1|DOCTORS SAY THEY ARE HOPEFUL.   
20110109140143.000|20110109140145.000|CC1|MEANWHILE, AUTHORITIES HAVE ONE 
20110109140145.000|20110109140148.000|CC1|SUSPECT IN CUSTODY.             
20110109140148.000|20110109140150.000|CC1|HIS NAME IS JARED LOUGHNER.     
20110109140150.000|20110109140151.000|CC1|AT THIS HOUR, OFFICIALS ARE     
20110109140151.000|20110109140153.000|CC1|HUNTING FOR SOMEONE WHO THEY    
20110109140153.000|20110109140154.000|CC1|THINK MAY HAVE BEEN ASSOCIATED  
20110109140154.000|20110109140155.000|CC1|WITH THE SUSPECT.               
20110109140155.000|20110109140157.000|CC1|THERE'S A PICTURE THEY'RE HOPING
20110109140157.000|20110109140158.000|CC1|SOMEONE WILL RECOGNIZE AND CALL 
20110109140158.000|20110109140159.000|CC1|WITH INFORMATION.

20110109140201.000|20110109140203.000|CC1|THE LATEST FROM HERE IN ARIZONA.
20110109140203.000|20110109140204.000|CC1|WE'LL HAVE A CONVERSATION WITH  
20110109140204.000|20110109140207.000|CC1|TWO PEOPLE WHO HELPED SUBDUE THE
20110109140207.000|20110109140209.000|CC1|SHOOTER UNTIL POLICE ARRIVED.

20110109140245.000|20110109140246.000|CC1|IS CONDUCTING A JOINT

20110109140248.000|20110109140249.000|CC1|HAVE THE GUNMAN IN CUSTODY,     
20110109140249.000|20110109140251.000|CC1|THOUGH AS YOU MENTIONED THEY ARE

20110109140253.000|20110109140257.000|CC1|THE TARGET.

20110109140300.000|20110109140303.000|CC1|SUBURBAN GROCERY STORE.         
20110109140303.000|20110109140305.000|CC1|SATURDAY JUST AFTER 10:00, A    
20110109140305.000|20110109140310.000|CC1|GUNMAN BEGAN HIS RAMPAGE.       
20110109140310.000|20110109140311.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS WAS      
20110109140311.000|20110109140312.000|CC1|MEETING WITH HER CONSTITUENTS.  
20110109140312.000|20110109140315.000|CC1|THE GUNMAN TURNED THE PISTOL ON 
20110109140315.000|20110109140316.000|CC1|A CROWD.                        
20110109140316.000|20110109140317.000|CC1|>> THERE WERE EIGHT POPS THAT   
20110109140317.000|20110109140319.000|CC1|SET OFF REALLY QUICKLY.

20110109140321.000|20110109140322.000|CC1|FRENZY OF PEOPLE.

20110109140341.000|20110109140343.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS SHOT THROUGH AND

20110109140421.000|20110109140424.000|CC1|OTHER PEOPLE HAD HE NOT BEEN    
20110109140424.000|20110109140426.000|CC1|TACKLED BY TWO PEOPLE.

20110109140427.000|20110109140428.000|CC1|MINUTES FROM THE CRIME SCENE.

20110109140542.000|20110109140544.000|CC1|>>> EVENTUALLY JARED LOUGHNER   
20110109140544.000|20110109140547.000|CC1|WAS SUBDUED BY PEOPLE IN THE    
20110109140547.000|20110109140547.000|CC1|CROWD.                          
20110109140547.000|20110109140553.000|CC1|ONE JOE ZEMUDIO, AND DR. STEVEN 
20110109140553.000|20110109140553.000|CC1|LAIR.                           
20110109140553.000|20110109140554.000|CC1|GOOD MORNING TO BOTH OF YOU.    
20110109140554.000|20110109140557.000|CC1|THANKS FOR COMING ON WITH UP.   
20110109140557.000|20110109140558.000|CC1|DOCTOR, FIRST EXPLAIN YOU WERE  
20110109140558.000|20110109140600.000|CC1|IN THE CROWD TO SEE THE         
20110109140600.000|20110109140601.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN.                  
20110109140601.000|20110109140601.000|CC1|YOU SAW THE SHOOTER?            
20110109140601.000|20110109140603.000|CC1|>> I SAW THE SHOOTER.           
20110109140603.000|20110109140605.000|CC1|THERE WASN'T MUCH OF A CROWD.   
20110109140605.000|20110109140606.000|CC1|THERE WAS NOTHING IN FRONT OF   
20110109140606.000|20110109140607.000|CC1|THE TABLE.                      
20110109140607.000|20110109140608.000|CC1|I HAD ARRIVED, WALKED IN FRONT  
20110109140608.000|20110109140611.000|CC1|OF THE TABLE, TOOK A LOOK AT    
20110109140611.000|20110109140613.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN GIFFORDS, AND THEN  
20110109140613.000|20110109140614.000|CC1|CONTINUED TO PROCEED AROUND TO  
20110109140614.000|20110109140615.000|CC1|THE SIDE OF THE TABLE.          
20110109140615.000|20110109140618.000|CC1|SHE WAS THERE WEARING A RED     
20110109140618.000|20110109140621.000|CC1|BLAZER, TALKING TO A COUPLE.    
20110109140621.000|20110109140622.000|CC1|THERE WAS ANOTHER TWO PEOPLE    
20110109140622.000|20110109140623.000|CC1|BEHIND THE TABLE.               
20110109140623.000|20110109140624.000|CC1|>> YOU SAW LOUGHNER.            
20110109140624.000|20110109140626.000|CC1|WHAT DID HE DO?                 
20110109140626.000|20110109140628.000|CC1|I LOOKED UP JUST AS HE WAS      
20110109140628.000|20110109140630.000|CC1|SHOOTING HER.                   
20110109140630.000|20110109140631.000|CC1|THEN WITHOUT HESITATING HE      
20110109140631.000|20110109140633.000|CC1|CONTINUED TO SPRAY THE PEOPLE   
20110109140633.000|20110109140634.000|CC1|CLOSE BY WITH BULLETS.          
20110109140634.000|20110109140635.000|CC1|THERE WAS REALLY NO PLACE FOR   
20110109140635.000|20110109140636.000|CC1|THEM TO DO.                     
20110109140636.000|20110109140639.000|CC1|IT WAS KIND OF A CONSTRICTED    
20110109140639.000|20110109140639.000|CC1|AREA.                           
20110109140639.000|20110109140641.000|CC1|>> JOE, YOU WERE NEARBY.        
20110109140641.000|20110109140641.000|CC1|WHEN DID YOU DECIDE TO STEP INTO
20110109140641.000|20110109140643.000|CC1|ACTION?                         
20110109140643.000|20110109140646.000|CC1|>> AS SOON AS I HEARD THE       
20110109140646.000|20110109140647.000|CC1|REPEATED FIRE, LIKE YOU SAID,   
20110109140647.000|20110109140649.000|CC1|WHERE HE WAS DUMPING BULLETS, I 
20110109140649.000|20110109140650.000|CC1|JUST STARTED RUNNING.           
20110109140650.000|20110109140652.000|CC1|I DIDN'T EVEN THINK ABOUT IT.   
20110109140652.000|20110109140654.000|CC1|I ROUNDED THE CORNER, WENT DOWN 
20110109140654.000|20110109140656.000|CC1|THE BREEZEWAY, AND I SAW THEM   
20110109140656.000|20110109140658.000|CC1|ALREADY IN CONTACT WITH HIM     
20110109140658.000|20110109140659.000|CC1|WRESTLING WITH HIM.             
20110109140659.000|20110109140701.000|CC1|>> DOCTOR, YOU WERE ALSO        
20110109140701.000|20110109140702.000|CC1|WRESTLING WITH HIM TRYING TO GET
20110109140702.000|20110109140704.000|CC1|HIM DOWN.                       
20110109140704.000|20110109140705.000|CC1|WAS SHE SAYING ANYTHING?        
20110109140705.000|20110109140708.000|CC1|>> I DID NOT HEAR ANYTHING      
20110109140708.000|20110109140710.000|CC1|EXCEPT MAYBE YOU'RE HURTING MY  
20110109140710.000|20110109140710.000|CC1|ARM.                            
20110109140710.000|20110109140711.000|CC1|>> HAD HE BEEN DISARMED BY THE  
20110109140711.000|20110109140713.000|CC1|POINT YOU TWO WERE ON THE TOP OF
20110109140713.000|20110109140713.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20110109140713.000|20110109140715.000|CC1|>> WHEN I MADE CONTACT THEY     
20110109140715.000|20110109140717.000|CC1|ALREADY HAD THE FIREARM OUT OF  
20110109140717.000|20110109140718.000|CC1|HIS HANDS.                      
20110109140718.000|20110109140720.000|CC1|>> WHEN HE WAS SHOOTING, WAS IT 
20110109140720.000|20110109140722.000|CC1|CLEAR HE WAS AIMING FOR THE     
20110109140722.000|20110109140723.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN INITIALLY?        
20110109140723.000|20110109140724.000|CC1|>> YEAH, SHE WAS THE FIRST      
20110109140724.000|20110109140726.000|CC1|TARGET, BUT HE DID NOT HESITATE.
20110109140726.000|20110109140729.000|CC1|HE CONTINUED AT CLOSE RANGE,    
20110109140729.000|20110109140731.000|CC1|POINT-BLANK RANGE JUST TO SHOOT 
20110109140731.000|20110109140731.000|CC1|BULLETS INTO PEOPLE.            
20110109140731.000|20110109140733.000|CC1|>> HOW DID YOU STAY SAFE?       
20110109140733.000|20110109140735.000|CC1|>> WELL, INITIALLY AFTER THE    
20110109140735.000|20110109140740.000|CC1|SORT OF SUDDEN SHOCK OF IT,     
20110109140740.000|20110109140741.000|CC1|INSTANCEIUSLY, I THEN DUCKED    
20110109140741.000|20110109140743.000|CC1|BEHIND A CONCRETE PILLAR.       
20110109140743.000|20110109140745.000|CC1|AS HE MOVES AROUND THAT PILLAR, 
20110109140745.000|20110109140747.000|CC1|I LAID ON THE GROUND, I SENSED  
20110109140747.000|20110109140749.000|CC1|HE WAS COMING AROUND, SO I LAID 
20110109140749.000|20110109140751.000|CC1|ON THE GROUND AS IF I HAD BEEN  
20110109140751.000|20110109140751.000|CC1|SHOT.                           
20110109140751.000|20110109140753.000|CC1|>> JOE, WHEN YOU WERE RUNNING   
20110109140753.000|20110109140754.000|CC1|UP, HOW DID YOU STAY OUT OF     
20110109140754.000|20110109140755.000|CC1|HARM'S WAY?

20110109140757.000|20110109140759.000|CC1|BEEN FIRED WHEN I ROUNDED THE   
20110109140759.000|20110109140759.000|CC1|CORNER.                         
20110109140759.000|20110109140802.000|CC1|I WAS -- THERE WAS NO MORE REAL 
20110109140802.000|20110109140803.000|CC1|DANGER FOR ME.

20110109143335.000|20110109143335.000|CC1|SIGNAL HE WAS GETTING A LITTLE  
20110109143335.000|20110109143336.000|CC1|RADICAL, BUT THAT'S ABOUT IT.   
20110109143336.000|20110109143337.000|CC1|>> DID HE EVER TALK ABOUT GUNS

20110109143345.000|20110109143345.000|CC1|>> ALL RIGHT.

20110109143851.000|20110109143852.000|CC1|HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE?           
20110109143852.000|20110109143853.000|CC1|>> MOST PEOPLE DON'T SURVIVE IT.
20110109143853.000|20110109143854.000|CC1|A THROUGH AND THROUGH OF THE    
20110109143854.000|20110109143857.000|CC1|BRAIN, THE MORTALITY RATE IS AT 
20110109143857.000|20110109143858.000|CC1|LEAST 90%.                      
20110109143858.000|20110109143901.000|CC1|WHAT'S FORTUITOUS IN THIS       
20110109143901.000|20110109143904.000|CC1|SITUATION IS THE BULLET         
20110109143904.000|20110109143904.000|CC1|REPORTEDLY WENT THROUGH A PART  
20110109143904.000|20110109143907.000|CC1|OF THE BRAIN THAT DIDN'T HIT ANY
20110109143907.000|20110109143908.000|CC1|SPINAL FLUID, DIDN'T HIT ANY    
20110109143908.000|20110109143910.000|CC1|MAJOR ARTERIES.                 
20110109143910.000|20110109143911.000|CC1|REPORTS ARE THAT IT WENT THROUGH
20110109143911.000|20110109143912.000|CC1|THE TEMPORAL LOBE.              
20110109143912.000|20110109143913.000|CC1|THAT MEANS IT WENT IN JUST ABOVE
20110109143913.000|20110109143917.000|CC1|HER EAR AND OUT THROUGH THE     
20110109143917.000|20110109143917.000|CC1|FOREHEAD.                       
20110109143917.000|20110109143918.000|CC1|IN HERE AND OUT HERE.           
20110109143918.000|20110109143920.000|CC1|THE REASON THAT'S IMPORTANT IS  
20110109143920.000|20110109143921.000|CC1|BECAUSE THIS AREA HAS TO DO WITH
20110109143921.000|20110109143922.000|CC1|SPEECH.                         
20110109143922.000|20110109143926.000|CC1|AND THE FRONTAL AREA HAS TO DO  
20110109143926.000|20110109143928.000|CC1|WITH ORGANIZATION, AFFECT, HOW  
20110109143928.000|20110109143928.000|CC1|YOU PRESENT YOURSELF TO PEOPLE. 
20110109143928.000|20110109143931.000|CC1|AS A CONGRESSWOMAN WHO MUST     
20110109143931.000|20110109143933.000|CC1|THINK ABOUT WHAT SHE'S GOING TO 
20110109143933.000|20110109143935.000|CC1|SAY, SAY IT, ORGANIZE THOSE
